articles.title: Our guide to every Week 6 NFL game: Matchup previews, predictions, picks and nuggets
articles.summary: Here's everything you need to know for Week 6 games. Which teams will win, who are the X factors, and which storylines matter most?

articles.title: Predictions, fantasy sleepers, trends for Week 6: Keep an eye on Sam Darnold?
articles.summary: Could Darnold be a fantasy sleeper? Can K.C.'s defense stop Detroit's play-action? Here's last-minute intel.

articles.title: Source: Cards QB Murray expected out Sunday
articles.summary: Arizona Cardinals QB Kyler Murray is expected to miss Sunday's game against the Colts because of a foot injury. Jacoby Brissett is slated to start.

articles.title: Sources eye bevy of NFL trades before deadline
articles.summary: Sources expect more trade activity ahead of this year's NFL trade deadline.

articles.title: Sources: Chase expected to play in Flacco's debut
articles.summary: All-Pro wideout Ja'Marr Chase is expected to play Sunday at the Green Bay Packers, a source confirmed to ESPN's Jeremy Fowler.

articles.title: Falcons rule WR Mooney out vs. Bills on Monday
articles.summary: Falcons No. 2 wide receiver Darnell Mooney has been ruled out for "Monday Night Football" against the Bills because of a hamstring injury.

articles.title: Commanders rule out receivers McLaurin, Brown
articles.summary: Commanders coach Dan Quinn has ruled out wide receivers Terry McLaurin (quad) and Noah Brown (groin/knee) for Monday's game against the Bears, while Deebo Samuel (heel) is uncertain to play.

articles.title: QB Sanders to back up Gabriel against Steelers
articles.summary: Shedeur Sanders will be the backup quarterback to starter Dillon Gabriel on Sunday in the Browns' divisional road game against the Steelers, coach Kevin Stefanski announced Friday.

articles.title: Bills' Hamlin, Sanders to IR; Milano out for MNF
articles.summary: The Bills placed S Damar Hamlin and DT T.J. Sanders on injured reserve and ruled LB Matt Milano out for Monday night's matchup against the Falcons, coach Sean McDermott announced Saturday.

articles.title: Lamar ruled out; Ravens to roll with Rush again
articles.summary: The Ravens have ruled quarterback Lamar Jackson out for Sunday's game against the Rams, marking the second straight week he has missed.

articles.title: 🍼 Bo Nix and wife Izzy announce pregnancy
articles.summary: The Denver Broncos quarterback announced the news in a shared Instagram post with his wife, Izzy Nix.

articles.title: Week 6 inactives: Who's in (Ja'Marr Chase?) and who's out (Kyler Murray?)
articles.summary: Updated inactives and analysis based on the latest reports and official announcements leading up to kickoff.

articles.title: Don't be surprised if... McMillan finds end zone, Judkins finishes top 3 in rushing
articles.summary: Week 6 storylines include a pair of impressive rookies, and is the Mayfield/Egbuka connection sustainable?

articles.title: 'Basically playing for pizza': Remembering Sean Payton's six-month run as the QB of the Leicester Panthers
articles.summary: Before he became a Super Bowl-winning coach, Payton played quarterback on an English team alongside bouncers and construction workers.

articles.title: All the top scenes from the Jets and Broncos' trip to London
articles.summary: The NFL plays its second consecutive game in London in Week 6.

articles.title: Pain, rehab and unlikely inspiration: Inside Aidan Hutchinson's return to dominance
articles.summary: Hutchinson's long journey back from a broken leg found inspiration from children whom he has inspired, too.

articles.title: 'Man, he loves football. You can feel it': How Deebo became an instant hit in D.C.
articles.summary: Samuel has made an instant impact in Washington since joining from San Francisco.

articles.title: Move Breece Hall? Quinnen Williams? Could Jets be movers at trade deadline?
articles.summary: After an 0-5 start, New York might be thinking about the future ahead of the Nov. 4 trade deadline.

articles.title: Why the 2025 NFL season has seen a historic number of last-minute drives
articles.summary: The 17 games that featured a go-ahead score in the final minute of regulation are the most through five weeks of a season since the merger.

articles.title: The AFC North QB landscape is not what it was to start the season: What's going on?
articles.summary: It's a bizarre time in the division with Aaron Rodgers the only starting QB who began 2025 in that capacity for the same team.

articles.title: Betting Lions-Chiefs: Plenty of points projected, but will that happen?
articles.summary: Lions-Chiefs has the highest points total of the week at ESPN BET, but is it too high? Here are our best bets for the game.
